begin.content:
"I saw your girl last night," Ratz said, passing Case his second Kirin.
"I don't have one," he said, and drank.
"Miss Linda Lee." Case shook his head."

end.content: A year here and he still dreamed of cyberspace, hope fading nightly. All the speed he took, all the turns he'd taken and the corners he'd cut in Night City, and still he'd see the matrix in his sleep, bright lattices of logic unfolding across that colorless void...

error.content: The color of television, tuned to a dead channel.

help.content:
Useful commands:
1. 'begin' -- Begin your journey.
2. 'help' -- Display this screen.
3. 'end' -- Start over.
